footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Eula | Update Date: 02/27/2023 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Songs of Broken Pines:__
This weapon has the highest base ATK of any weapon in the game, combined with a substat that gives Physical DMG bonus, passive that gives the entire team ATK speed and additional ATK%, makes it her BIS

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__**ATK% substat weapons:**__
__Wolf's Gravestone, Beacon of the Reed Sea, Luxurious Sea-lord, Protype Archaic, Akuoumaru__
Since Eula's damage does not rely on reactions, having higher ATK stats/buffs greatly increase her damage. Wolf's Gravestone's passive and naturally high ATK stat as a 5* weapon makes it comparable to her signature weapon. This is similar for Beacon of the Reed Sea, which gives CRIT Rate and ATK%. Luxurious Sealord and Akuaoumaru are a great options, boosting her Elemental Burst damage alongside their ATK% substat. 
__**Other options:**__
__Serpent Spine__
A battle pass weapon with a CRIT rate substat and  a powerful passive skill that lets it sometimes rival 5* weapons, due to it's low base ATK, ATK% buffs scale very well.
__Snow-tombed Starsilver__
An alternative option if you don't have billets or don't want to craft Prototype Archaic, since it is completely free. It has a high base ATK stat + Physical DMG bonus, and it's passive is especially useful when Rosaria is on the team

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Energy Recharge |<goblet>  Physical DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate / CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Glacial Illumination
**2)** Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework - Edel
**3)** Elemental Skill: Icetide Vortex

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: It is highly recommended to use Genshin optimizer(https://frzyc.github.io/genshin-optimizer/#/), when deciding to prioritizing between CRIT DMG and ATK%, since the performance of these two stats may change depending on your weapon, teammates and the presence of external ATK% buffs
